title: Sven the Zombie Slayer
description: When a zombie outbreak of unknown origin hits their town, strongman Sven, gun-lover Jane, track star Lorie, and video game warrior Milt find that their lives have become entangled in zombie gore.The first sequel to Sven the Zombie Slayer is City Hall of Blood.The second sequel to Sven the Zombie Slayer is Mayor of the Damned.
author: Guy James
